1157 .
Oculipetilus pulcher
(Melzer, 1926)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Lectotype : Brazil , Minas Gerais
:
Virgínia . Passa Quatro ( Fazenda dos Campos ,
1500 m
),
02.XII.1920
, J.F. Zikán. The specimen is herein designated as the lectotype in order to stabilize the taxonomy and facilitate further identification of this species.
